a.xlink:title: Set the rotation of the sprite.
To call when the engine starts, indexes all Lua bindings.
Configures the LevelSprite with the given ComplexNode.
Loads the Scene from a .map.vili file.
Loads the GameObject through the GameObject Definition File.
Updates all elements in the Scene.
Starts the development Menu where you can starts other menus from.
Start the game by loading the boot.lua file in one of the MountedPaths.
